title: -- Respond to Aggression -- 1 with aiState7
body:
Apparently doesn't belong in gameplay... even though it shows up in games.... while playing.... >_>

ANYWAY... I just want to know what it is. Maybe it is just a bug and that is why it belongs here or maybe gameplay is meant for suggestions on gameplay and not help on knowing what a possible gameplay element is. Dunno.

replies.body: Yeah, this is a known issue!  As amazing as it would be for League to know when my salt is building up, this is just some error string that's been popping up.  Should be fixed up in no time!

Had this same bug happen in-game. Our team noticed that it seems to trigger every time Elise is fighting the new Krugs on either side. Her spiderlings also seem to be connected to the bug. By extension, I suspect that AI-controlled player units may also trigger the bug.

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/153724060/32095452
